N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 153.3 - Certification

State Regulations

The board of education of the city school district of the

City of New York shall submit to the department at the time reimbursement for
expenditures in connection with such programs is sought, a written statement
which certifies that such programs were implemented and operated in compliance
with the provisions of all applicable rules and regulations of such board of
education, the rules of the Board of Regents and regulations of the

Commissioner of Education and the Education Law. Such board shall also submit
to the department a statement of expenditures, in accordance with standard
accounting procedures, which clearly indicates that all funds for which
reimbursement is sought have been obligated. Notes
